page.title: 10LEISURE IN HORWICH
page.content: Perhaps the most famous recreation and leisure amenity in Horwich is the Leisure centre and swimming pool. The golf course has many visitors.People come from all over to play there. Station park has tennis courts that are very popular with the local people.There is also a crazy golf course and an all weather pitch with floodlights.There is a brook running through the park in which children play.The children's park has two swings and two slides and is very popular with youngsters. Rivington is an ideal place for walking especially in the summer months.People often walk in Wilderswood,where they can take a packed lunch.
